turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some pizza please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what pizza place would you like a pie from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Brooklyn's Pizza on Mariposa Road, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you check if they make speciality pizzas, first?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. It looks like they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, okay, can I order a pineapple and sausage pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size will that be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add wings or soda?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, we have some already.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll put the order in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, your order has been processed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, when will it be done?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will take about 15 to 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, a confirmation text with your receipt will be sent to you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your meal.

items.name: Sure, your order has been processed.
